lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Aihins AMiDAwrI mix kwF rwKY kRIVw kY durwvY pun kwhU n idKwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Ahinis Andhiaaree Mani Kaaddh Raakhai , Kreerhaa Kai Duraavai Poun Kaahoo N Dikhaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as during dark nights, snake takes out its jewel, plays around with it and then hides it and does not show to anyone.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy br nwr kr ishjw sMjog Bog hoq prBwq qn Cwdn CupwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Bar Naar Kar Sihajaa Sanjog Bhoga , Hot Parabhaat Tan Chhaadan Chhoupaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a virtuous wife enjoys the pleasure of the company of her husband at night and as the day breaks, re-drapes herself.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Al kml sMpt Acvq mD Bor Bey jwq auf nwqo n jnwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Al Kamal Sanpat Achavat Madha , Bhor Bhaay Jaat Ud Naato N Janaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a bumble bee closed in the box-like lotus flower keep sucking the sweet elixir and flies away in the morning as soon as the flower blooms again without acknowledging any relationship with it.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gurisK auT bYTq AMmiRq jog sB suDw rs cwK suK qiRpqwvhI ]568]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Gursikh Outth Baitthat Anmrit Joga , Sabh Sudhaa Ras Chaakh Soukh Tripataavahee ?568?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, an obedient disciple of the True Guru absorbs himself in the meditation of the Lord's name and feels satiated and blissful relishing the elixir like Naam. (But he does not mention his blissful state of the ambrosial hour to anyone).  (568)
